description:
Clean & spacious room with large bed. Brand new interior
Quick walk to Union Square, and close to Metro
Close to nice restaurants and bars in East Village, easy access to Time Square, Central Park. Very clean and safe area of New York

We are renting the apartment in May as we will be overseas.
Clean & spacious room with large bed, kitchen and nice spacious and clean bathroom.
Quick walk Union Square, and close to Metro
Close to nice restaurants and bars in East Village and Gramercy Park. Easy access to Time Square and Central Park.
Very clean and safe area of New York
Room is equipped with air conditioner and fresh towels. We also provide tea and coffee to our guests.
Second Avenue on the corner has a lot of restaurants and bars.

Guests have access to kitchen, living room , room and bathroom.

Lower Manhattan - easy access to Time Square, Central Park, etc.
A lot of bars and restaurants close by.

Close to L train and 6 train.
name: Nice apartment on Lower Manhattan
review:
The apartment is amazing, the room is big with lot of space, very clean and close to nice restaurants. 

Nice and safe area and quiet during the night.

The apartment is close to the metro, but  we also could walk to Union Square,  Flatiron Building and Washington Square, etc.

We really enjoyed this apartment

I believe if you looking for a centrally located, private and comfortable stay, consider Maria's place.
